content: design n° 10560 easy crochet we triple-check one size our patterns to stories guarantee success when you use more colours sirdar yarns double knitting on back page established in west yorkshire in 1880 sirdar is a british yarn company with a rich hand knitting heritage generations of families have grown up wearing sirdar hand knitting yarns and designs each season we complement your favourite sirdar classics with the latest yarn innovations stories and effects for fashionable knits and we triple check every stylish sirdar pattern to double knitting guarantee a successful knit with the recommended sirdar yarn cool comfortable natural cotton is perfect for summer makes and this cotton rich acrylic blend creates lighter garments that keep their shape try these shades turn to the back page to choose your favourite my friend saw my festival crochet top on my instagram and asked me to make her one too i ll use one of the other colourways on the pattern so we don t match 10 cm / 4 17 stitches double_crochet pattern 4 / mc 01 swor 12 803 pillow talk 812 sunseekers 806 dreamers 819 pool party follow the pattern instructions for your size measurements 56 cm circumference 22 gauge & yarn * crochet hook 2 no balls yarn f137 stories dk 50g shade 839 silent disco or 803 pillow talk you also need 1 4 00 uk8 -
